sentences.sContent: There are no failures in life, only those who quit before success.
sentences.sContent_eng: There are no failures in life, only those who quit before success.
sentences.sCn: 生活中没有失败者，只有那些在成功前就放弃的人。

sentences.sContent: With this view there are no failures only those who quit before success.
sentences.sContent_eng: With this view there are no failures only those who quit before success.
sentences.sCn: 这样看就没有失败的人，只有那些在胜利之前就放弃的人。

sentences.sContent: ...They also had talk therapy with a nurse before and after quit day...
...People rarely manage to quit the first time they try...
...the quit rates were particularly convincing given that before the study started...
...she found out that her mom quit the right way—by stopping abruptly and completely...
...more people who had quit abruptly had stuck with it—more than one-fifth of them...
...One had to quit abruptly on a given day...
...She quit her job when she became pregnant...
...Eventually she wants to quit teaching and work as a full-time journalist...

remMethod.val: “愧的” → 因愧疚而辞职 → 辞(职)

words.tran: 收据；免除，赦免；报酬，补偿
